reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made, soft, and comfortable, noting it's not itchy at all.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy fall staple sweater!
items.body: So comfy!! The perfect fall sweater for a cozy fall fit. I will say the sleeves are oversized and my hands drown in it but I like it just like that. It's definitely true to size as an oversized sweater. But easy to dress up or dress down whatever you need. It's a thick knit sweater too so it's going to last quite a while. Definitely the best quality sweater I've bought from Amazon and it's a fall staple to have in your closet! Going to buy one for my sister and mom to have too because it's too good not to have! Read more
items.author: Andrea

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great oversized sweater!
items.body: Beautiful! I ordered several oversized sweaters for a mountain trip and this was one of my favorites. It’s baggy yet flattering in the right places. Comfortable, soft, and looks more high end than the price tag. Both green colors are gorgeous, but the cream is more see through. Read more
items.author: Ashley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great basic sweater! Cable knit elevates it.
items.body: Great basic sweater. Nicely roomy and the cable knit is a good detail. I’ve worn it with jeans and also an A-line skirt and it looked good with either! Definitely a pleasant addition to my winter wardrobe. Washes well- separately, cold water, delicate cycle, shape and dry flat. Lovely! Read more
items.author: Shelli Ainsworth

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, soft nice quality
items.body: Super cute and VERY soft I had to return the first one because I didn’t like the fit of it it says oversized but it wasn’t really oversized so got the XXL and I liked the fit (usually wear M) wanted a sweater dress feel, not too happy with the second purchase because I received it used and it has a snag on it and not as soft as the first purchase like maybe washed (first purchase was in airtight perfect fold, second was ripped open bag and not airtight) also has a LPN label which means it is a return will be returning for different color now and hopefully an actual new sweater Read more
items.author: Megan conner

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice and Warm
items.body: This is a sweater is chunky and warm. It doesn't keep its shape very well. The ribbing on cuffs and at the bottom very quickly went baggy. The sweater looks nice and is reasonably thick and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Krys Brennand

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Color; Brown
items.body: Quality is 10/10 It is very soft, and heavy (perfect to keep warm) I chose brown however it looks like a dark brownish burgundy color. I’d say to NOT dry this sweater, just air dry. Overall, great value for your money, and I would buy again! Read more
items.author: Kym Tangaro

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best sweaters since i turned 70 yesterday.
items.body: Love love it! Since I turned 70, I hate the way everything looks on me now, not because I've gained weight, but I've lost almost 5 inches in height due to bone accidents, age height loss and body simply changing for the worse but scale stays the same. I ordered another of the same sweater only different color and will continue to buy another one every week till I have them all! I almost look like me again in these sweaters. They are perfect. They hide all my age imperfections and I don't look like a big sloppy mess. I will look into their other styles and ill let you know how I feel about them. Happy shopping with them! These sweaters gave me a little class again and it made me feel good again...of course until I changed...ya can't have everything! Lol Read more
items.author: Maria Lucas

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft on my skin
items.body: Very soft on my skin not itchy like most sweaters I have seen. Fits wide so buy smaller size. Wash by hand. Hang flat. Beautiful colors. Negatives not long enough for tall people. I’m Read more
items.author: corazon stewart

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Beige White, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Oatmeal, Brick Red, Dark Green, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, White, Dark Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
